name: Allows linking to objects in another space.

instance.name: Contentful Space ID
instance.description: The Space ID to link to

instance.name: Access Token
instance.description: A CDN access token for querying the other space

instance.name: Content Type
instance.description: The Content Type to look for in the other space

instance.name: Display field (or template)
instance.description: A field or template string to be executed to create the entry's display name

instance.name: Value field (or URL)
instance.description: A field on the entry, or a URL template to get the entry.  Defaults to 'sys.id'
